alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 8:57PM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Fond du Lac and Sheboygan Counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 3 AM CST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 3 AM to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
